name: AmbientWaveSoundsforSleep
0:
”Alexa open ambient wave sounds”
”Alexa ask ambient wave sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ambient wave sounds
des: Let the sounds of an ambient wavescape lull you into a deep sleep. Ambient Wave Sounds is the ultimate science-backed companion for relaxation, focus, and better sleep. \n\nAll you need to do is say Alexa start Ambient Wave Sounds, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
